pages.text:
There are seven gods that are worshipped by the races of Ardania. Between them all, they rule over the skies, the earth, the creatures, and even death itself.

Historically, there have been very few friendly, or even neutral, relationships between them and it was not unknown for one god to forbid the worship of another in the same

area, lest a holy war break out.

But even the Gods realized the severity of The Fall and not only have they grudgingly agreed to exist peacefully in the same space, but a select few have formed alliances to allow a melding of their powers to aid worthy adventurers.
The subsequent pages in this category state the original domain and personality of each God, and how they've changed since The Fall and what their powers are currently.
